props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the popover when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: modal
props.description: The modality of the popover. When set to true, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only popover content will be visible to screen readers.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the popover.
